subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: The best hockey player in the world may not be Sidney Crosby or Alex Ovechkin, or any other forward. It may be a 37-year-old goalie who didn’t even become an N.H.L. starter until six years ago.
snippet: The best hockey player in the world may not be Sidney Crosby or Alex Ovechkin, or any other forward. It may be a 37-year-old goalie who didn’t even become an N.H.L. starter until six years ago.
